content: Operator: Good morning, and welcome to the Malibu Boats Conference Call to discuss Second Quarter Fiscal Year 2023 Results. For the second fiscal quarter, we posted strong net sales of $339 million, increasing nearly 28% over the prior year, with adjusted EBITDA growing approximately 20% to $58 million and net income growing 18% to $36 million. With respect to discounting Gerrick, it really is not a meaningful factor incrementally from a boat show or year-end sales event perspective, itâs â youâre not seeing an incremental discount drag versus what weâve seen historically. The other thing I would add to that is that if you look at the details of those monthly numbers that youâre talking about, youâre talking about comps that are still really, really high, if you look at them in a historical context, when you elongate the period that youâre looking at that and you look at the first half of the fiscal year performance, itâs in line with the entirety of the market.
